p: For the focus reduction neutralization test (FRNT), hMAbs were diluted 4-fold and mixed with ~45 focus-forming units (FFU) of virus, and incubated for 1 hour at 37°C. After incubation, virus:hMAb mixture was added to Vero-81 cells for 1 hour at 37°C or C6/36 cells for 1 hour at 32°C, then overlay was added and cells were incubated and fixed and stained as described above. Foci were counted and FRNT 50 titers were calculated as the concentration of antibody or sera dilution factor required to neutralize 50% of the virus. Neutralization assays are based on two (HMAbs) or one (immune sera) experiments performed in triplicate.
